LanguageData.JRWBernicia.label: Bernicia
LanguageData.JRWBernicia.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #0244439-1927 [BERNICIA PRAECURSOR] CODENAME: SHELL >355
Slow and friendly, these big extinct snails are a cute - albeit slimy - addition to any colony. Looking past their incredibly slow speed, these gastropod wonders have insanely strong shells, and can secrete a ruddy copper paste that, when dried, can be used as a hard plastic.
LanguageData.JRWBernicia.tools.head.label: head
